template.name: Controller

location.name: Waiting
location.label:
>>>>>>>>> Waiting <<<<<<<<<
Controller remains in wait state until the end of game is reached.

location.name: Spawn_Enemy
location.label: (circlesSpawned==NUM_CIRCLES || circleSpawnTimer<=CIRCLE_SPAWN_TIME) && (squaresSpawned==NUM_SQUARES || squareSpawnTimer<=SQUARE_SPAWN_TIME)

>>>> Spawn_Enemy <<<<
State in which rest of the remaining enemies are spawned.

location.name: Place_Turret
location.label:
>>>>>>> Place_Turret <<<<<<<
At each iteration: - it setups all the variables related to a turret in the global array turrets[]; - it sends a signal to the related TurretProcess().

location.name: Initial_Enemies
location.label:
>>>>>>>> Initial_Enemies <<<<<<<<
It spawns the first two enemies which must spawn at time 0. The square is spawned first so it is targeted first (To respect targeting priorities).

location.name: Won
location.label:
>>>>> Won + Lost <<<<<
Final states reached at the end of the game. They indicate the configuration's result.

template.name: EnemyTemplate

location.name: Not_Spawned
location.label:
>>>>>>> Not_Spawned <<<<<<<
Used to wait for the initialization signal. Once received, it resets timers.

location.name: Targeted
location.label:
>>>>>>>> Targeted + Send_Signal <<<<<<<<
It checks if enemy can be targeted by any ready turret. If yes, at each iteration, it sends a signal to wake up the turret.

location.name: Waiting
location.label: moveTimer<=speed()

>>>>>>>>>>>>> Waiting <<<<<<<<<<<<<
Used to wait for the moving period. In the meantime, it checks if enemy is still alive.

location.name: Moving
location.label:
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Moving <<<<<<<<<<<<<<
It updates the enemy's position and, if necessary, it selects a path.

location.name: End
location.label:
>>>>>>>>>>>>> End <<<<<<<<<<<<<
Final state, enemy is dead or has reached the Main Tower. Enemy can't be targeted anymore.

location.name: Attacking
location.label: moveTimer<=speed()

>>>>>>>>>>>>> Attacking <<<<<<<<<<<<<
Enemy attack the Main Tower and wait for the moving period to leave the map

template.name: TurretTemplate

location.name: Not_Placed
location.label:
>>>>> Not_Placed <<<<<
Used to wait for the initialization signal.

location.name: Firing
location.label:
>>>>>>>>>>>>> Firing <<<<<<<<<<<<<
It checks if a target is available: - if yes, it shoots; - if no, it stays ready.

location.name: Reload
location.label: fireTimer<=fireSpeed()

>>>>>> Reload <<<<<<
Used to wait for the reloading period.

location.name: Ready
location.label:
>>>>>>>>>>> Ready <<<<<<<<<<<
Wait for an enemy to enter inside the range to shoot it.

query.formula: A[] (deadlock imply ((ControllerProcess.Won || ControllerProcess.Lost) && forall(i : enemyId_t) EnemyProcess(i).End))
query.comment:
(Property I) The game never reaches a deadlock state.
Checks that the only possible reason to be deadlocked is the end of the game and that all the entities are in their final state.

(Property II) All enemies can reach the Main Tower.
Checks that all the enemies will reach the Main Tower's coordinate when there are no turrets

query.formula: A[] forall(i : enemyId_t) ((enemies[i].type == CIRCLE && !isMainTower(enemies[i].pos)) imply (EnemyProcess(i).spawnTimer <= (PATH_LEN * CIRCLE_SPEED)))
query.comment:
(Property III) Circles reach the Main Tower in no more than n · c time units, where n is the length of the longest path from the start of the Map to the Main Tower, and c is the speed of the Circles.
Checks that if the enemy is not at the Main Tower's coordinate then the enemy was spawned less than (PATH_LEN * CIRCLE_SPEED) time units ago

query.formula: A[] forall(i : enemyId_t) ((enemies[i].type == SQUARE && !isMainTower(enemies[i].pos)) imply (EnemyProcess(i).spawnTimer <= (PATH_LEN * SQUARE_SPEED)))
query.comment:
(Property IV) Squares reach the Main Tower in no more than n · s time units, where n is the length of the longest path from the start of the Map to the Main Tower, and s is the speed of the Squares.
Checks that if the enemy is not at the Main Tower's coordinate then the enemy was spawned less than (PATH_LEN * SQUARE_SPEED) time units ago

(Property V) All enemies never leave the red path.
Checks that in all the possible game situations all the enemies are in a path cell

query.formula: A[] (deadlock imply ((ControllerProcess.Won || ControllerProcess.Lost) && forall(i : enemyId_t) EnemyProcess(i).End && forall(j : turretId_t) TurretProcess(j).Ready))
query.comment:
(Property VII) The game, under the configuration described in point (VI), never reaches a deadlock state.
Checks that the only possible reason to be deadlocked is the end of the game and that all the entities are in their final state.

(Properties VI / VIII) Verify whether the following configuration is winning or losing.
Checks if the selected configuration is a winning configuration. (THE RESULT MUST BE OPPOSITE TO NEXT QUERY)

(Properties VI / VIII) Verify whether the following configuration is winning or losing.
Checks if the selected configuration is a losing configuration. (THE RESULT MUST BE OPPOSITE TO PREVIOUS QUERY)
